name: Come Together
description:
Dive into the adventure of 2 squares! Help Blue and Pink find each other in the world of Come Together. Find the right path or solve the puzzle and make players meet! Keep track of each square and don't let things get out of control.

Features

  • 5 unique Stages and 40 hand-crafted levels are available to you in Early Access: explore a vast variety of atmospheric locations and overcome different challenges.
  • Lots of game mechanics: unlock new ones as you progress, use your knowledge to lead your way to success.
  • Collectable items and valuables: make new Inventory entries and put them to a good use.
  • NPCs and side quests: meet new friends, trade for resources and help locals to get cool rewards.
  • 3 game modes are available to you in Early Access: it's not just about changing the playfield, it's the complete overhaul of your playstyle.
  • Co-op: grab a friend and enjoy the game together. Control two players as a united force.
  • Level Editor & Custom Levels: build your own levels and play community-made ones.



It's not just about solving puzzle levels. The game is filled with dialogues, interactions and other listed features, including different challenges and difficult mechanics that will put your skills and precision to the test.



Who said that all the game modes have to be based around one specific rule or theme? New game mode = new game! Just imagine a situation where you’ve been playing a simple puzzle level with 4-directional movement, and the next second you are in the Platformer with big constructions and moving platforms, or even in a remake of a popular mobile title.
